metadata.synopsis: The player walks past and, if they notice (pass an insight check), responds to the ox looking at them strangely.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Walk to the tiefling cave, past Rolan and to the right. There will be two ox and Toron standing closeby. When close enough, a passive insight check will trigger.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I'd swear that ox's gaze is following me.
